programme.title: US bombing of Libya, 1986
programme.short_synopsis: The aftermath of the US air-strikes against Libya on 15th April 1986.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke on the aftermath of the US air raid on Libya of 15th April 1986, and the demands of pianist Vladimir Horowitz during his first visit to the USSR.
programme.long_synopsis: Alistair Cooke on the aftermath of the US air raid on Libya of 15th April 1986, and the demands of pianist Vladimir Horowitz during his first visit to the USSR.
